  • About the coat and brand

    This 130s tux is fine quality you can see and feel. The higher the s number the better the quality of wool. Choose 130s if you’re looking for something really luxurious.

    Vera Wang presents BLACK, her first collection of men's formalwear fitted to the modern groom.

    Available for rent or purchase.
    Available in boy sizes.
